类的使用
PhD

    • <Unnamed>中PhD的使用

      返回PhD的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      PhD PhD.advisor1()
      Return the first advisor of this PhD (null if unknown).
      PhD PhD.advisor2()
      Return the second advisor of this PhD (null if unknown or non-existent).
      参数类型为PhD的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean PhD.areSiblings(PhD p)
      Return value of "this person and p are intellectual siblings."
      boolean PhD.gotAfter(PhD p)
      Return value of "p is not null and this person got the PhD after p.”
      void PhD.setAdvisor1(PhD p)
      Add p as the first advisor of this person.
      void PhD.setAdvisor2(PhD p)
      Add p as the second advisor of this person.
      参数类型为PhD的<Unnamed>中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      PhD(java.lang.String n, int m, int y, PhD adv1)
      Constructor: a PhD with name n, PhD month m, PhD year y, first advisor adv1, and no second advisor.
      PhD(java.lang.String n, int m, int y, PhD adv1, PhD adv2)
      Constructor: a PhD with name n, PhD month m, PhD year y, first advisor adv1, and second advisor adv2.
